entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of drizzle. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain or snow beginning in the morning then changing to snow in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 5 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016
